Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Main Street in the center of the Oceancrest Shopping District.
Room.LongDescription: A large shopping complex is located to the east of Main Street. The center boasts a repair shop, a fighting academy and other fine imports from throughout the lands. Main Street continues to the north and south. Heading south leads you towards the town's southern entrance, about a block away. Heading north brings you into the center of Oceancrest.
